version_description:
[NEW]
Have you already switched to iOS11? Lake has, and it’s fun!
- With the drag and drop feature all iOS11 users can now rearrange their gallery by hand, drag finished drawings directly into text or email messages … It’s so smooth, check it out!
- We’ve added support for promoted In-App Purchases, so you can browse them directly on the App Store
- Our devs did some magic and solved a couple of glitches

Found a bug, have an artist suggestion? Send us an email: feedback@lakecoloring.com

[GOOD TO KNOW]
Coloring has therapeutic potential to reduce anxiety, create focus and bring more mindfulness.

[COMING SOON]
One of the most desired and colorful updates. SOON. Stay tuned!

[SPOOKTAKULAR]
- No tricks, just treats: subscribe and get 25% OFF monthly subscription (limited-time offer)

[NEW]
- Introducing a start of a very exciting collaboration with the world's first web-based service for custom fabric creation, Spoonflower! Take part in our creative challenge, and you just might get featured in Lake!
- There is magic in the night when pumpkins glow by moonlight; hold on tight, 'cause this Halloween pack will make you fright! It is filled with the likes of witches, cats, and bats.
- Two new artists Linda Jäderberg and Katie Wilson adding their coloring books to Lake collection shortly
- A bunch of hocus pocus known as bug removal

[GOOD TO KNOW]
A review today keeps the monsters away!

Have something to say? Send an email: feedback@lakecoloring.com

Bugs And Hisses,
your Lake Team

[NEW]
- iPhone X? Bring. It. On. We've done some charming UI improvements to make sure your coloring experience stays as smooth as ever
- Help us get the bestest illustrations to become a part of the upcoming Spoonflower pack! Vote on your fave designs of the "Black and White Coloring Book Design Challenge" straight from the app
- An occasional hiccup while trying to save a masterpiece should now become a blurred memory from far away

[DID YOU KNOW]
It is scientifically proven that coloring improves your mental, emotional and intellectual health. <3

[COMING SOON]
- A rad tattoo artist that goes by the name of Hugo

Have something to say? Please do!
feedback@lakecoloring.com

Thanks for all your support, it means the world to us.

Did you say you want more colors? Lots of colors? LOADS of colors? Then this update is for YOU! We are super happy to introduce a brand new color wheel along with the color picker!

[NEW]
- The Weather Wheel: yes, the new color wheel has a name! Once you tap on it, you will understand why. ;) Choose from over 700 different shades (along with the much requested *real* red) and create your own perfect palette
- The Color Picker: helps you easily select a previously used color directly from the drawing you are working on
- If you were among the unlucky ones experiencing inconvenience with saving your coloured pieces that should no longer be an issue. Bug status: destroyed.
- Happy ink news: Hugo K is joining us with a colouring book full of his tattoo art

[COMING SOON]
Queen of body positivity Jiji Knight and her Marshmallow Maidens!

Have something to say? Please do! >> feedback@lakecoloring.com

[DID YOU KNOW]
Focusing closely on coloring a complex design can be a particularly effective way to practice mindfulness, especially if you are not comfortable with meditation.

If you have a story on how Lake is affecting you, we would love to hear it > feedback@lakecoloring.com

Lake is now officially one of the #BestOf2017 apps! It means so much to us that App Store editors recognize our app as a helpful tool to reduce stress and improve the quality of life. Very very honored!

[NEW]
> From 14 until 31 December we'll have something festive in store for you all! In our Winter Stories coloring pack, you'll be receiving a free daily drawing from various artists.
> Thai artist Ploypisut and her gorgeous Asian fauna and flora are adding some tenderness.

[GOOD TO KNOW]
A part of every purchase you make on Lake goes directly to our artists.

Have something to say? Send us an email > feedback@lakecoloring.com

Are you collecting your daily Lake winter stories? There's one for each day until New Year's, come!

[NEW]
> There was a persistent autosave bug on board. But guess what? We are persistent as well! And we say with great relief that you should no longer stumble upon it in Lake.
> A few minor improvements for a smoother experience.

[COMING SOON]
> Mr. Lemonade is the master of the food court. There's pizza, noodles, tacos, burger, ice cream... Hungry yet?
> New feature unveiling on the 1 January. Hint: 2018 is a blank canvas, and you should paint it your own way!

We wish you all warm holidays, lots of calm and happy moments wherever and with whomever you feel most at home!

Your Lake Team

> Mixed artists coloring pack Winter Stories is a New Year's gift from us to you!
> NEW feature: we have added a blank canvas so you can paint from scratch. Go to New Beginnings
> There was a persistent autosave bug on board. But guess what? We are persistent as well! And we say with great relief that you should no longer stumble upon it in Lake.
> A few minor improvements for a smoother experience.

[COMING SOON]
> Mr. Lemonade is the master of the food court. There's pizza, noodles, tacos, burger, ice cream... Hungry yet?
> Spoonflower coloring pack arriving​ with a bit of delay in mid-January

We wish you lots of calm and happy moments!

Your Lake Team

The new year is a blank canvas, and so is our latest feature. Come to New Beginnings and paint away!

[NEW]
> Mr. Lemonade invites you to join him on a food journey around the world!
> A few minor improvements for a smoother experience.

[COMING SOON]
> New artist Nenad Cizl and his "Memories don't fade"
> Spoonflower coloring pack got stuck in a traffic jam but don't panic! It is due to arrive in mid-January

[DID YOU KNOW]
> The color green has healing power and is understood to be the most soothing and relaxing color for the human eye to view. It can help enhance vision, stability, and endurance. Try calming down by coloring a piece using green shades only.

[NEW]
> The Spoonflower pack comes with 16 FREE professional artists designs. Color them your way and then order a print of it on fabric, wallpaper or gift wrap directly from the app!
> Who says memories fade? Definitely not Nenad Cizl nor his animal creatures. Yup, a new artist on board!!
> Some bug fixes and UI improvements.

[COMING SOON]
> An update that will get a cheer from all the Dots lovers!

Lake meets Two Dots and a beautiful love story takes place. Update to see the result!

[NEW]
> Two Dots, a puzzle game loved by millions, can now be recreated on Lake! The coloring pack is free and comes with 12 illustrations created by the fab Two Dots team. And there's more: share your artwork and it just may get featured in Two Dots game. How about that!

[MUST PLAY WITH]
> The Two Dots custom color palette!

[COMING SOON]
> Find it hard to fall asleep? Chop, Lake's first artist from China, is coming to the rescue with his Good Night Stories!

Remember, by leaving a review on the App Store you help us grow and by letting us know about possible issues you help us improve --> support@lakecoloring.com

Thanks for being a part of the Lake community.

We are welcoming a new artist, Benjamin Hayte, and waving goodbye to a couple of bugs! Oh, and we are back to our favorite shade of blue.

[NEW]
> What is your idea of strange animals? Not all of us might have it but Benjamin Hayte sure does and he also has the skills to create his very own animal kingdom.
> Some minor bugs leaving the building. Au-revoir, fellas!

[COMING SOON]
Fan of fairy tales? Then you'll fall head over heels for Bunny Hill and their residents! Vanessa Gillings sure knows how to make a heart melt.

[DID YOU KNOW]
When you’re coloring, you’re not really thinking about anything else, your breathing slows down and you move into a state of calm. It is an effective way to relieve stress and anxiety.

Remember, by leaving a review on the App Store you help us grow and by letting us know about possible issues you help us improve --> support@lakecoloring.com or @lakecoloring on FB, TW, IG.

[NEW]
Introducing Summer Calm! With this various-artists coloring book, available from July 1 until August 31, we'd like you to join us on a self-care journey! You will receive 14 seasonal illustrations in 14 days. For any two weeks this summer, commit yourself to a daily 20-minute mindful coloring break as a stepping stone to a more peaceful, and more present you.
[LAKE TIP]
Turn the push notifications on for a daily reminder to take a self-care time-out and to get your new Summer Calm coloring page.
[BE OBSERVANT]
As you color every day, pay attention to how it affects you and how your mood changes. If it feels good and if this is something that works for you, try to make it a daily ritual and prolong this coloring journey.

Love Lake? Write a review!
Have a question? Write an email! --> support@lakecoloring.com

[NEW]
> It's all about the bunnies in this free collection by Hopper, the super efficient and beautiful travel app that is quickly becoming the go-to way to book travel. These cuties are available for a limited time only so make sure to catch them and go coloring today!

Say hi to a couple of lovely new artists and get ready for the tasty goodies, hidden in Lake’s Easter basket.

[NEW]
> We hope you like fairy tales, because Vanessa Gillings’ coloring book invites you to a cute bunny village full of magnificent scenery and romantic characters. Enter the world of bunnies and let your imagination run wild.
> We’re constantly looking around to make sure that all naughty bugs that are caught in Lake slowly but surely find their way out.

[COMING SOON]
> It’s time to hold your breath! The bold and fabulous illustrator Eleonora Arosio will light up your ordinary day with the most incredible artistic circus performers.
> There’s a little something for everyone in another mixed-artist-pack coming out right in time to sharpen your coloring skills before you start dyeing eggs for Easter.

Do you have an idea, suggestion, concern, or something else you want to share with us? We’d love to hear from you --> support@lakecoloring.com. Thanks for helping us grow.

Turn the push notifications on for a daily reminder to take a self-care time-out and to get your new Summer Calm coloring page.
[BE OBSERVANT]
As you color every day, pay attention to how it affects you and how your mood changes. If it feels good and if this is something that works for you, try to make it a daily ritual and prolong this coloring journey.

Love Lake? Write a review!
Have a question? Write an email! --> support@lakecoloring.com

[NEW]
Introducing Summer Calm! With this various-artists coloring book, available from July 1 until August 31, we'd like you to join us on a self-care journey! You will receive 14 seasonal illustrations in 14 days. [NEW]
Introducing Summer Calm! With this various-artists coloring book, available from July 1 until August 31, we'd like you to join us on a self-care journey! You will receive 14 seasonal illustrations in 14 days. For any two weeks this summer, commit yourself to a daily 20-minute mindful coloring break as a stepping stone to a more peaceful, and more present you.

[LAKE TIP]
Turn the push notifications on for a daily reminder to take a self-care time-out and to get your new Summer Calm coloring page.

[BE OBSERVANT]
As you color every day, pay attention to how it affects you and how your mood changes. If it feels good and if this is something that works for you, try to make it a daily ritual and prolong this coloring journey.

Love Lake? Write a review!
Have a question? Write an email! --> support@lakecoloring.com

Hey! Lake just got a whole new touch and feel. From our brand’s look to the way you discover art you love. Come closer.

Finding a drawing that really speaks to you, saving your favorite coloring books in a visible spot, and having control over your interaction with the app, has just become as smooth as butter. We hope you’ll love it as much as we do!

“Cleaner, simplified and more organized. Like a real notebook,” as one of the lovely Lake users put it.

[NEW]

SMOOTH SAILING
There are now 4 tabs to help you navigate on Lake:
• HEY! The always up-to-date editorial tab with the hottest artists and coloring motifs of the moment. Daily favorites, new artist, latest collection, themed segment, and Editors’ choice weekly pick - all in one place! Let Hey! be your starting point whenever you come to Lake.
• ALL ART is the keeper of all coloring books available on Lake. To make it easier to find that purrfect coloring motive, simply browse through the categories.
• MY STUDIO is dedicated solely to your personal Lake involvement! It’s your safe-zone, your art space. All of your colorings will be saved here automatically. You can have multiple copies of the same drawing, and keep a list of your most beloved coloring books at the touch of your fingertips in My List. There’s also Blank Canvas to help you release your tension by expressing yourself without any limitations.
• MY GALLERY is a wall where you can put up your favorite colorings.

LAKE PEARLS
• Close the opened coloring book by simply dragging it up or down!
• Every coloring book cover colors itself right in front of you, just hold your finger on it and enjoy the magic! And it’s not just about being pretty. All the covers are empty at the beginning, but once you color a piece in them, they turn into their colored version. This way you always know which coloring books you’ve already left your mark in.
• Our Weather Wheel has turned into a Rainbow and it’s now the only wheel in Lake. It comes in three shades, the Cloudy one being the main one and free for all users.

NEW ARTIST
Come, step into the new Lake experience with Cleonique Hilsaca, a Honduran Illustrator, living and loving the wilderness of Savannah. Her coloring book Fairy Lullaby is all about sweet hocus pocus and mysterious Halloween stories with friendly faces. Let’s go, it’s trick or treat time!

NEW COLLECTION
We are celebrating this milestone with a Welcome collection! It consists of 8 beautiful coloring pages by talented Lake artists: Jiji Knight, Maja Säfström, Isadora Zeferino, Victoria Åström, Joey Gao, Tammy Hadeed, Daniel Sulzberg, and Eleonora Arosio. Each drawing represents one of Lake's heart values. You get one per day. Free for all!

[DID YOU KNOW]
The coloring pages in Lake are all created by indie artists who love what they do and put their heart into what they create. By subscribing to Lake, you return the love since we share our monthly income directly with them.

Ready to unplug from the world? Tap the update button and gently immerse yourself in coloring.

Let us hear your thoughts >>

Email: info@lakecoloring.com
Instagram: @lakecoloring
Twitter: @lakecoloring

Waving some bugs goodbye! Your renewed Lake experience should now be as relaxing as we would like it to be. Update and come closer. 

[NEW]
› Your previously purchased coloring books are now all yours again. So sorry about the mishap! 
› Restoring your purchases will now actually do what it promises to do. 
› If you were stuck on spinners on some drawings, guess what? Yup, fixed.  
› Gallery previews no longer suffer from an identity crisis. 
› Drawings you have colored from the Hey! tab will no longer be on lockdown and will remain yours forever.
› ... and your shares will now look even slicker. Try them out! 

[GOOD TO KNOW] 
We see some of you are worried that all the free art is gone, which is so not the case. Free art is still available! You can find it in all sections of the Hey! tab and you get new free drawings every day: just make sure to come and claim (= color) them. 

Thanks for all the feedback: this way you help us evolve and grow!

Sailing on Lake is about to become even smoother. Get cozy, check out what's new and take a relaxing creative break! 

[NEW] 
› Our collections are now on their best behavior! The drawings you’ve already colored no longer have a will of their own and you should now be able to access them at any time. 
› Artist Instagram handles are B A C K! You can stalk them directly from the app. We won't tell. 
› From now on, any drawings saved to My Gallery are also available in Work in progress on My Studio, where you can redo them or delete - whatever you want. 
› Bye-bye to unpredictable, unwanted and uninvited crashes! 

[GOOD TO KNOW] 
The Hey! tab is changing daily! Here, we bring you our daily favorites, present you with the latest collections by various artists, introduce new artists, offer different theme sections (e.g. cats, MEOW) every day, and every Monday we choose 3 artists that deserve a special spot within Editors' Choice! Also, free drawings in each of the mentioned categories. 

We hope you enjoy the redesigned Lake. Either way, we would like to hear your thoughts! Thank you, friends.

Instagram, Twitter: @lakecoloring
Facebook: facebook.com/lakecoloring

December is for contemplation and introspection. Gently dive into the process with the help of 31 winter stories waiting to unfold. 

[NEW] 
› Introducing a new heart-warming coloring collection: Winter Magic. It’s here to lighten up the short days of December. It comes with 31 festive illustrations by 31 Lake artists, one per each day. Each illustration is free on the day it's due, so make sure to check in every day and collect them all! 
› Russian artist Uliana Babenko’s will try to enchant you with her magical fairy tales. Cozy up and get to know her wonderful creatures! 
› We have escorted a couple of bugs to freedom. Bon voyage, fellas! 

[KINDLY REMINDER] 
Stay happy and healthy during this holiday season by taking good care of yourself. Try to get enough sleep, eat healthily, accept what you can control and release the rest, make time for exercise and take as many time-outs as you need. Make room for all that is you and try to embrace it. 

Harbor some love for Lake? Write a review.
Have a question? Write an email --> support@lakecoloring.com

December is for contemplation and introspection. Gently dive into the process with the help of 31 winter stories waiting to unfold.

[NEW]
› Introducing a new heart-warming coloring collection: Winter Magic. It’s here to lighten up the short days of December. It comes with 31 festive illustrations by 31 Lake artists, one per each day. Each illustration is free on the day it's due, so make sure to check in every day and collect them all!
› Russian artist Uliana Babenko’s will try to enchant you with her magical fairy tales. Cozy up and get to know her wonderful creatures!
› We have escorted a couple of bugs to freedom. Bon voyage, fellas!

[KINDLY REMINDER]
Stay happy and healthy during this holiday season by taking good care of yourself. Try to get enough sleep, eat healthily, accept what you can control and release the rest, make time for exercise and take as many time-outs as you need. Make room for all that is you and try to embrace it.

A bit late to the party, but we are bringing a bottle, so to speak! Now introducing Dark Mode!

[NEW]
› About Dark Mode. It’s tied directly to your system settings, so whatever mode your iPhone or iPad is in, Lake will be in as well. Some words of wisdom: mindful coloring practice before bedtime can help you fall asleep faster. The process of coloring will allow you to slowly unwind after a long day and relax your body and mind. Try to see how this works for you!
› We are being joined by our 64th artist! Luna Valentine from Poland loves drawing cute magical people and finding whimsy in their everyday life. Beware, she will put a spell on you ...
› We are waving hello to Dark Mode and goodbye to our ‘Black Mode’! Yikes. If you were one of the unlucky ones who were experiencing their canvas going black (gulp), you should be on the safe side now.
 
[COMING SOON]
In February, Lake will become fluent in Brazilian Portuguese, Pусский, Français, 日本語. Can. Not. Wait.

Thanks for your feedback: this way, you help us evolve and grow!

It's time for some vibrant Brazilian colors! We are super happy to announce Lake is now available in Brazilian Portuguese. Olá!

[NEW]
> Isadora Zeferino from Rio has blown us away with her new collection of 12 coloring pages full of diverse Brazilian elements. Color your stress away in the great company of wild animals, lovely baianas, stunning landscapes, and unique regional celebrations, including the world-famous Carnaval. Put on an upbeat song and take a deep dive into Brazil’s rich culture! Spoiler alert: the food might make you hungry. You've been warned!
> Special shout out-to Edison Veiga, who worked hard on adapting Lake into Brazilian Portuguese, making it more accessible to over 200 million people. Thank you, Edison!
> We are waving some minor bugs bye-bye.

[COMING SOON]
In the upcoming weeks, Lake will become fluent in 3 more languages: Russian, Japanese, and French!

Spread the word - in whatever language! :)

Email: info@lakecoloring.com
IG and TW: @lakecoloring
Facebook: facebook.com/lakecoloring

Some new strong women aboard and ... a new language! Come and see. 

[NEW]
> Introducing a new coloring book by Venezuelan artist Caribay M. Benavides. Her wild ladies enjoy being surrounded by nature without losing their hip looks. Go ahead, use all the colors of the rainbow because these wild and exotic plants only exist in the imaginary world of the wild and trendy women.
> From today on, Lake speaks Russian. A sincere and loud THANK YOU to you, the wonderful Alyona Kondratyeva, for putting your time, knowledge and love into making this possible and by doing so, making Lake more accessible for many people out there.
> Bugs? What bugs? Out of the window they went.

[LAKE TRIVIA]
Let's talk some lake facts, shall we? Russian lake Baikal is the deepest lake in the world, and it contains about 20% of the world’s freshwater. It is home to about 1,700 species of plants and animals, two-thirds of which can be found nowhere else in the world. Our Lake, on the other hand, is home to exactly 67 unique artists, who are scattered all around our beautiful planet.

[COMING SOON]
In the upcoming weeks, Lake will also be learning Japanese and French.

Harboring some love for Lake? Drop us a review!

IG and TW: @lakecoloring
Facebook: facebook.com/lakecoloring

> Introducing a new coloring book by Venezuelan artist Caribay M. Benavides. Her wild ladies enjoy being surrounded by nature without losing their hip looks. Go ahead, use all the colors of the rainbow because these wild and exotic plants only exist in the imaginary world of the wild and trendy women.
> From today on, Lake speaks Russian. A sincere and loud THANK YOU to you, the wonderful Alyona Kondratyeva, for putting your time, knowledge and love into making this possible and by doing so, making Lake more accessible for many people out there.
> Bugs? What bugs? Out of the window they went.

[LAKE TRIVIA]
Let's talk some lake facts, shall we? Russian lake Baikal is the deepest lake in the world, and it contains about 20% of the world’s freshwater. It is home to about 1,700 species of plants and animals, two-thirds of which can be found nowhere else in the world. Our Lake, on the other hand, is home to exactly 67 unique artists, who are scattered all around our beautiful planet.

[COMING SOON]
In the upcoming weeks, Lake will also be learning Japanese and French.

Harboring some love for Lake? Drop us a review!

This one is all about the Land of the Rising Sun. We are welcoming our first Japanese artist and introducing the Japanese language!

[NEW]
> Each artist brings a new flavor to Lake, and this time is no different! We are happy to welcome Yuri Takahashi and invite you on a coloring journey with her adorable character Tiyoko.
> Lake speaks Japanese! We are super happy to be getting rid of one more language barrier and giving a chance to an even wider audience to find peace of mind while trying something new. This could not have happened without our wonderful colleague Yasuko Sueyoshi. She invested tons of love and care in making sure Lake's essence did not get lost in translation, and for that, we bow to her!

[MINDFUL COLORING]
Mindful meditation can come in many forms, mindful coloring being one of them. If you are seeking to develop a greater sense of awareness by being present in the moment, go ahead and give it a go. Try focusing on the illustration, the details, on your choice of colors, the strokes you make while coloring, ... Observe your thoughts along the process, try to be mindful of your feelings and try not to react. Let your feelings come and go without really judging them.

In these sad times, we are reaching out to you (while keeping a healthy social distance!) with a unique stay-at-home offer. Be safe, folks!

[PAUSE WITH SELF-CARE]
These days, the world is becoming united by being separated. With this comes more me-time, but also more opportunities for anxiety to sneak in. We are all stuck in different situations and handling it the best we can. If you live with someone, it may be challenging to be compassionate and patient at all times. If you can, try to take care of yourself first. That way, you will have the capacity to be kinder to others. Or simply to yourself. One of the tools that can bring you closer to yourself is coloring. There is a whole community out there transforming their worries and stress into bringing illustrations to life their own way through colors. If you are not one of them yet, you may want to try it! Maybe it’s something that can work for your peace of mind as well.

[STAY-AT-HOME OFFER]
To make Lake's relaxing effects available to an even wider audience, we have unanimously decided to offer our yearly subscription at a significantly reduced price during this difficult time. And by significantly, we mean SIGNIFICANTLY! We hope to improve your mood, even if it is just a little bit.

If you can, stay at home, stay calm and stay healthy. We will get through this together. <3

Lots of love and support,
Lake team

And remember, you can always reach out to us:
Email: info@lakecoloring.com
IG and TW: @lakecoloring
Facebook: facebook.com/lakecoloring

[NEW]
Some bug squashes and performance improvements to smoothen your Lake sailing.

[TRAIN YOUR FOCUS]
Coloring is an uplifting way to unwind in a stressful time. It opens up your frontal lobe, which controls organizing and problem-solving, and allows you to put everything else aside and be present in the moment, generating focus. Choose an illustration that speaks to you and color it however you like. Remember, this is a safe place, where you can do no wrong, everything goes.

[PSSSST]
You know that comforting sound pencils make when you are coloring on paper? You will soon be able to experience it in your favorite digital coloring book. Stay close.

Lots of love and support,
Lake team

You can now color in with sounds and feels! Soothing brush sounds will help you immerse fully into relaxation.

[NEW]
> A new artist has just landed on the calm Lake surface. Make room for some real-time Amazons and Adonises! French artist Pan Peekaboo is about to bring joy to all mythology and strong character enthusiasts.
> Introducing ASMR! Pick an illustration of your choice, choose a tool, and start coloring. Let your fingers loose and dive deeper into relaxation with the help of different therapeutic brush sounds, and the added bonus of feeling the pleasant texture underneath your fingers (feels come with iPhone only).
> Yes, different tools make different sounds! However, if this isn't quite up your alley, you can always switch ASMR on/off in Settings.
> Rushing some bugs to freedom ... Shoo!

[DID YOU KNOW]
You may be asking yourself what ASMR is, and we are happy to explain. It is an autonomous sensory meridian response (ASMR), the tingling sensation you might feel while coloring in with this feature on. The sensation typically begins on the scalp and moves down the back of the neck and upper spine. ASMR is also known as a brain massage, and the whole point of it is to reeeelaaaaaaaaax us.

Have the most immersive experience,
Lake team

P. S. Once you’ve tried it out, take a moment to let us know how this feels for you. Your opinion matters!

> Yes, different tools make different sounds! However, if this isn't quite up your alley, you can always switch ASMR on/off in Settings.
> Rushing some bugs to freedom ... Shoo!

[DID YOU KNOW]
You may be asking yourself what ASMR is, and we are happy to explain. It is an autonomous sensory meridian response (ASMR), the tingling sensation you might feel while coloring in with this feature on. The sensation typically begins on the scalp and moves down the back of the neck and upper spine. ASMR is also known as a brain massage, and the whole point of it is to reeeelaaaaaaaaax us.

Have the most immersive experience,
Lake team

P. S. Once you’ve tried it out, take a moment to let us know how this feels for you. Your opinion matters!

Everyone needs a time out. Take one free sun-kissed piece a day to support you through the 2-week restoring period.

[NEW]
> New artist aboard; this time we got a Canadian in the house! Toronto’s own Nicolle Lalonde, a die-hard fan of all things retro and kitsch, is here to delight you with her dreamy storytelling.
> Seasonal housekeeping - checked.

[COMING SOON]
From the 1st of July on, we are introducing our Fun in the Sun collection with 14 unique sun-kissed stories by some of the Lake’s artists. You can color them every day at home, and make it a part of your 2-week restoring routine or while you are soaking in the sun on your well-deserved vacation. Find it on Hey! tab. Yes, it’s free for all.

We’d love to see your versions of any of these beauties! Share on social media, and tag @lakecoloring.

- Saying bye-bye to some naughty bugs and welcoming some performance improvements.

Take care, friends!

It's the jolliest time of the year and we want to sprinkle it with all the cheer, joy, and calm coloring can bring to your hearts. So we've prepared a little something for you.

NEW
From the 1st until the 25th of December, you will be in for a Winter Magic treat: one FREE drawing for every festive day.
 
Our heart-warming Winter Magic collection comes with 25 jolly drawings by various Lake artists, and it's made with the finest December spices. It's full of warm stories, steaming cups of hot chocolate, witty smiles, and uplifting vibes, so make sure to open Lake daily to unwrap them all.

Now cozy up and follow the magic!
Lake team
